description:
自2016年专四改革之后起，专四难度加大，为帮助考生应对改革后的专四考试，小编帮大家整理了一篇结合“新专四”各部分的改革题型的备考建议，供各位参考。

完型填空

改革后，完型填空题由一篇长度约250个单词、题材常见、难度中等的短文构成，题量由20道题减为10道题，考试时间由15分钟减至10分钟，考查形式由以前的单选题改为从15个备选词汇中选择10个依次填入对应的空格(每个单词或词组只能使用一次，无需任何词性、时态和单复数的变化)。

备考建议：

完型填空题主要考查考生的英语综合运用能力。

纵观历年专四考试，完型填空部分的得分率向来不高，而改革后的新题型更是令考生觉得无从下手。其实，完型填空题量的减少对考生而言是个好消息，这意味着考生在作答时不用在此部分花费过多的时间和精力。

此外，根据样卷，“新完型”中的15个备选词(as、aimless、bother、fast、flights、helpless、labor-saving、levels、money-saving、pause、quite、stand by、standstill、traffic、trapped)都是考生比较熟悉的词汇。

由此可见，新题型的难度并没有考生想象中那么大，只是换了种考查形式而已。对于这种“换汤不换药”的题型，考生不必过于担心，可以从大学英语六级的真题中选取考查形式类似的题目进行练习，培养自己对新题型的熟悉度。

 

祝各位考生都能取得满意的成绩！

title: 2017专四改革新政及备考建议：完型填空

description:
这种感觉大概谁都有过：高强度锻炼后的一两天，感觉浑身像被一堆疯狂的微型海狸在啃咬，那种疼痛从肌肉贯穿到骨头。于是你就想，那还锻炼个屁啊！

这个问题怎么解决？！

Don't do that. 千万别不锻炼

DOMS, while seriously unpleasant, is completely normal, and also manageable.“迟发性肌肉疼痛”尽管让你不爽，但却是再正常不过了，而且是可以控制的。

Soreness is basically your muscles adapting.酸痛说明你的肌肉正在适应

There's no easy fix 好起来不容易

The cliche of "no pain, no gain" is, sadly, mostly true when it comes to working out. While there are ways to limit and reduce the pain associated with DOMS, there's no quick fix to make it simply go away. 老话说“没有痛苦，就没有收获”，很遗憾，健身就是这么一回事。虽然有控制和减轻肌肉疼痛的方法，但是没有快速易行的方法让它彻底消失。

First, try to prevent excessive damage 首先，尽量避免过度的劳损

A little post-workout soreness is a good thing, but a lot of soreness isn’t necessarily better. DOMS shouldn't leave you laid up in bed for a week. It shouldn't prevent you from heading back to the gym for another workout.锻炼后有一点肌肉疼痛是好事，但是如果很痛那就不一定好了。迟发性肌肉酸痛不应该让你一周下不了床，也不应该阻止你再去健身房健身，甚至还引发横纹肌溶解症要去医院，那是一种肌肉过度损伤比较严重的情况。

Put on post-workout compression gear 运动后穿上紧身装备

I hope you like tight clothes, because squeezing yourself like a sausage into compression garments after a workout is one of the most legitimate ways to modestly reduce the effects of DOMS.希望你喜欢紧身衣，因为在运动后立即穿上紧身衣正事环节迟发性肌肉酸痛的最正统的方法之一。

Use a foam roller or get a massage 用泡沫轴拉伸或者是做个按摩

Like compression garments, foam rolling and massage therapy are not magic bullets for handling DOMS, but there's some evidence that both can help.就像运动紧身衣一样，就肌肉酸痛而言，用泡沫轴拉伸或者是做个按摩也并不会有立竿见影的神奇效果，但是有证据表明它们还是有一定的辅助效果的。

Keep moving 保持运动

The same study that analyzed the short-term benefits of post-workout massages also found that active exercise resulted in a similar, short-term relief of DOMS. You don't need to go all-out -- go for a walk, take a 30-minute bike ride, or sign up for a yoga class.同一个研究也显示，健身后的持续运动和在健身后做个按摩一样，能够在短时间内就环节迟发型肌肉酸痛。不需要出去正儿八经地锻炼，起身走走，骑半个小时的自行车，或者报个瑜伽课，都行。

Pop a pill 吃片止痛药

Never underestimate the power of ibuprofen. It won't do a darn thing to shorten your walk through DOMS hell, but it can help make you feel a little better through the process.不要小觑布洛芬缓释片的功效。它虽然不能缩短疼痛时间，但是能够减轻肌肉酸痛。

title: 为什么运动之后会酸痛？这个问题怎么解决？

description:
As a Foreigner, When You First Came to China, What Surprised You Most?作为首次来到中国的歪果仁，什么让你感到惊讶不已？

获得155好评的回答@Saisha Srivastava

The straightforwardness 中国人直接的性格。

The kindness 善良友好。

The evening dances in the moonlight月下的广场舞。

获得119好评的回答@Emeric Henon

The noise!噪音！

The huge roads and infrastructure! 宽阔的马路和完善的基础设施。

The people's behaviour! 人们的行为。

The Political and Social system!政治以及社会制度。

获得563好评的回答@Jessica Bolin

Too much attention太多人把注意力投向我。

Environmental friendliness注重环保。

获得157好评的回答@Tiaan Botha

The massive metros 庞大的地铁系统。

Friendly people友好的人们。

Efficient public transport高效的公交系统。

Food食物。

Non-stereotypical Chinese非典型的中国人。

获得115好评的回答@Shawn McCaslin

Buses.巴士。

Bridge construction.桥梁建设。

Lack of slums.并没有贫民窟。

title: Quora精选：外国人刚来中国，最吃惊的是？

description:
Let's now get a health check on the financial markets and talk to Justin Urquhart Stewart from Seven Investment Management. Hello there, Justin.

Hello.

So we heard there what's happening to the peso, the Argentina peso. But what about the dollar after that announcement from the Federal Reserve about the fact that it was going to raise interest rates?

Well I suppose it was good news at last. We've actually finally had this decision we thought it was gonna happen a few months ago. We'd been led by Ms Yellen into the idea that it was gonna happen then and then we got actually misled because she decided there actually was other things that was concerning her like the Chinese stock market, which of course has got nothing to do with the Fed at all. And she later then said actually I didn't really mean that after all. So we all got very confused indeed. So thank heaven this time we actually now have had a rate rise. And the relief was that actually now we've had it. And then secondly of course actually the US economy is in pretty good shape. Now I wonder it'd been expecting the result of that - actually the US dollar would then start weakening off considerably. But we haven't actually seen that - today it's weakened off a little bit - actually seen more strength, which has been really rather annoying and then combining that with the fact that we thought US economy doing well, actually pretty good figures coming from companies. So here's the Santa Rally - we're gonna have a Christmas stock brimming with goodies to actually give us a nice rally at the end of a rather tiresome year. And then it all disappeared. Now we've ended up with rather small ankle sock which is probably really rather smelly, not giving us anything at all. So we're really rather disappointed.
